# Sequence 12: Local common land

## Description
Sequence 12 focuses on local common land

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl065, apl066, apl067, apl068, apl069, apl070, apl071

## Emergent Phenomena
Common lands that strengthen community bonds and provide shared resources

## Overview
This sequence contains 7 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
